t = int(raw_input())
list1 =[]
if 1 <= t <= 1000:
    while t >= 1:
        string = raw_input()
        if "+" in string:
            string = string.split("+")
            list1.append(int(string[0])+int(string[1]))
        else:
            string = string.split("-")
            list1.append(int(string[0])-int(string[1]))
        t -= 1
for i in list1:
    print i
